items.longDescription:
FUTURALABORATORIES

FUTURALABORATORIES is a design company and lifestyle brand created by the artist FUTURA2000 in 1997, as a spinoff group to the parent company at that time; PROJECTDRAGON. FUTURALABORATORIES has always worked closely with UMBRELLA FILMS for visual amplification and TARANTULA DESIGNS as a graphic think tank. The brand has created many collections over multiple decades and found numerous partners in various collaborative efforts. FUTURALABORATORIES was rebooted in 2019 with excitement and engagement across multiple platforms.

Dries quickly for a smooth, fresh feel all day long. Perfect for sports or casual wear.
- Featuring DRY-EX technology.
- With an iconic Futura print.
- A versatile item for sports or everyday wear.

Futura Laboratories LLC.
items.name: MEN FUTURA LABORATORIES DRY-EX Crew Neck Short Sleeve T-Shirt
items.shortDescription: Dries quickly for a smooth, fresh feel all day long. Perfect for sports or casual wear.

items.longDescription:
Mickey Manga Art

UNIQLO has invited acclaimed artists and illustrators to reinterpret the famous Disney character in their own distinct style. It’s Mickey like you’ve never seen him before, with new and original artwork exclusively at UNIQLO. This season’s theme is the pop culture that represents Japan, “MANGA.” Enjoy this collaboration between Japanese manga and Mickey with Osamu Tezuka (1928-1989), Fujio Akatsuka (1935-2008), and Kotobuki Shiriagari (1958-).

Kotobuki Shiriagari

Japanese manga artist and creator born in 1958. He is drawing attention as a new type of gag manga artist, with parodies at the center. While continuing his unique work in a variety of genres such as long stories and satirical mangas, he is recently expanding his creations into various other directions such as videos and art.

©Disney
items.name: Mickey Manga Art UT (Short Sleeve Graphic T-Shirt)
items.shortDescription: A miraculous collaboration between the world-beloved Mickey Mouse and some of Japan’s best manga artists, Osamu Tezuka, Fujio Akatsuka, and Kotobuki Shiriagari.

items.longDescription:
- 100% cotton.
- Comfortable T-shirt for everyday styling.
- A versatile oversized design with raglan sleeves.
- Classy T-shirt that can be worn in any kind of scene.
items.name: Raglan Sleeve Half Sleeve T-Shirt
items.shortDescription: 100% cotton T-shirt with a laidback feel. Can be worn in any kind of occassion.

items.longDescription:
The National Art Center, Tokyo | Kashiwa Sato

Kashiwa Sato, one of Japan’s leading creative directors, has gained renown internationally with his innovative approaches to visual identity / corporate identity planning and brand strategies. The largest ever solo exhibition “KASHIWA SATO,” introducing the broad spectrum of his career over the past 30 years, is held from Feb 3 to May 10, 2021 at the National Art Center, Tokyo.

Keith Haring

A key figure in New York's East Village scene in the late 1970s and 80s, American artist Keith Haring's artwork populated not only art galleries, but also the city's subways, streets, and sidewalks. His work often combined an iconographic vocabulary, including hearts, flying saucers, winged figures, and a crawling "radiant baby", with abstract marks and patterning.

© Keith Haring Foundation. Licensed by Artestar, New York.
items.name: MEN Kashiwa Sato UT (Short Sleeve Graphic T-Shirt)
items.shortDescription: A UT collection by creative director Sato Kashiwa is here, full of his creativity and attention to detail.

items.longDescription:
The National Art Center, Tokyo | Kashiwa Sato

Kashiwa Sato, one of Japan’s leading creative directors, has gained renown internationally with his innovative approaches to visual identity / corporate identity planning and brand strategies. The largest ever solo exhibition “KASHIWA SATO,” introducing the broad spectrum of his career over the past 30 years, is held from Feb 3 to May 10, 2021 at the National Art Center, Tokyo.

Mickey Mouse

Disney's Mickey Mouse is a character loved around the world for his big, round ears, rich expressions and cute gestures. In his debut "Steamboat Willie", he showed off his many talents such as singing, dancing, and playing musical instruments. Since then, he has played many roles in over 140 different productions.

© Disney
items.name: MEN Kashiwa Sato UT (Short Sleeve Graphic T-Shirt)
items.shortDescription: A UT collection by creative director Sato Kashiwa is here, full of his creativity and attention to detail.

items.longDescription:
The National Art Center, Tokyo | Kashiwa Sato

Kashiwa Sato, one of Japan’s leading creative directors, has gained renown internationally with his innovative approaches to visual identity / corporate identity planning and brand strategies. The largest ever solo exhibition “KASHIWA SATO,” introducing the broad spectrum of his career over the past 30 years, is held from Feb 3 to May 10, 2021 at the National Art Center, Tokyo.

Mobile Suit Gundam

"Mobile Suit Gundam" is a popular robot anime series that was first aired in 1979. Since then, many Gundam series have been aired and the anime continues to excite children and adults from around the world with its story, mobile suits, and unique characters.

©SOTSU・SUNRISE
items.name: MEN Kashiwa Sato UT (Short Sleeve Graphic T-Shirt)
items.shortDescription: A UT collection by creative director Sato Kashiwa is here, full of his creativity and attention to detail.

Typography collection of the world-renowned graffiti artist Stephen ESPO Powers which selected and reworked his archives. The words and illustrations on the designs are very thoughtful, unique and will make every day a little happier.

©Stephen ESPO Powers

items.shortDescription: Stephen ESPO Powers’ thoughtful, unique and cheerful words and illustrations make their UT debut!

SUPER MARIO 35th

Since its creation in 1985, Super Mario Bros. has been loved by many people around the world and in 2020 will celebrate its 35th anniversary. Going beyond the games, Super Mario is also popular in many different genres. Introducing this collection that features everyone’s favorite hero!

©Nintendo

items.shortDescription: Super Mario is loved even beyond the games! Various versions of Mario are featured!

PETER SAVILLE REMIX

Peter Saville is a graphic artist whose contribution to everyday life has been unique. As a founder and art director of the legendary record label ‘Factory,’ his pioneering artwork reached a mass audience through pop music and influenced the course of contemporary visual culture.

© Peter Saville and New Order
items.name: Peter Saville UT (Short Sleeve Graphic T-Shirt)
items.shortDescription: A collection showcasing the pioneering masterpieces of influential graphic artist Peter Saville.

items.longDescription:
Sci-Fi Movie Collection

Science-fiction movies continue to draw attention and stir imagination of viewers through their futuristic views of the world and use of the latest technologies. This collection features some iconic sci-fi movies and we have picked famous scenes and quotes from those and incorporated them into our designs.

The Matrix Revolutions

In this explosive final chapter of the Matrix trilogy, Neo, Morpheus and Trinity battle to defend Zion, the last real-world city, against the onslaught of the machines that have enslaved the human race. And, now as Neo learns more about his heroic powers — including the ability to see the codes of things and the people, he faces the consequences of the choice made in The Matrix Reloaded.

WB SHIELD: TM & © WBEI. (s20)
items.name: Sci-fi Movie UT (Short Sleeve Graphic T-Shirt)
items.shortDescription: This collection features famous scenes from some of the greatest sci-fi movies.

items.longDescription:
Sci-Fi Movie Collection

Science-fiction movies continue to draw attention and stir imagination of viewers through their futuristic views of the world and use of the latest technologies. This collection features some iconic sci-fi movies and we have picked famous scenes and quotes from those and incorporated them into our designs.

The Matrix

An explosive sci-fi adventure about a man who comes to believe that his everyday world is the product of a computer-driven digital matrix that feeds on humans.

WB SHIELD: TM & © WBEI. (s20)
items.name: Sci-fi Movie UT (Short Sleeve Graphic T-Shirt)
items.shortDescription: This collection features famous scenes from some of the greatest sci-fi movies.

items.longDescription:
Sci-Fi Movie Collection

Science-fiction movies continue to draw attention and stir imagination of viewers through their futuristic views of the world and use of the latest technologies. This collection features some iconic sci-fi movies and we have picked famous scenes and quotes from those and incorporated them into our designs.

2001: A Space Odyssey

Stone Age Earth: In the presence of a mysterious black obelisk, pre-humans discover the use of tools — and weapons — violently taking first steps toward intelligence. 1999: On Earth's moon astronauts uncover another mysterious black obelisk. 2001: Between Earth and Jupiter, the spacecraft's intelligent computer makes a mistake that kills most of the human crew — then continues to kill to hide its error. Beyond Time: The sole survivor of the journey to Jupiter ascends to the next level of humanity.

2001: A SPACE ODYSSEY and all related characters and elements © & ™ Turner Entertainment Co. WB SHIELD: TM & © WBEI. (s20)
items.name: Sci-fi Movie UT (Short Sleeve Graphic T-Shirt)
items.shortDescription: This collection features famous scenes from some of the greatest sci-fi movies.

“Gunpla” are three-dimensional plastic models of items that appear in the “Mobile Suit Gundam” series, such as the mobile suit. A collection designed with popular motifs from “Gunpla,” which has sold more than 500 million units since its release in 1980.

©SOTSU·SUNRISE

items.longDescription:
TEXT MESSAGES

Text Messages celebrates the work of artists who use language as a medium. Their text might pose a question, issue a challenge, or remind us to take action. We are excited to partner with these artists to bring their words to life.

About MoMA

The Museum of Modern Art in New York City is the world’s home for modern and contemporary art. Founded in 1929, MoMA was the first museum dedicated to new art and this bold, experimental vision continues to guide us today. We share the most thought-provoking and resonant works, from painting to performance, and are a place of creativity and inspiration for all.

Robert Indiana

Robert Indiana was an American artist, a pioneer of the Pop Art movement, who created a highly original body of work that explores the power of language, American identity and personal history. His image LOVE with its trademark tilted O is recognized globally as an influential piece of 20th Century Art.

© 2020 Morgan Art Foundation Ltd /
Artists Rights Society (ARS), NY
Project: 2020 by The Museum of Modern Art
items.name: Text Messages UT (Short Sleeve Graphic T-Shirt)
items.shortDescription: Bringing to life the works of artists who use language as medium.

items.longDescription:
Mickey Manga Art

UNIQLO has invited acclaimed artists and illustrators to reinterpret the famous Disney character in their own distinct style. It’s Mickey like you’ve never seen him before, with new and original artwork exclusively at UNIQLO. This season’s theme is the pop culture that represents Japan, “MANGA.” Enjoy this collaboration between Japanese manga and Mickey with Osamu Tezuka (1928-1989), Fujio Akatsuka (1935-2008), and Kotobuki Shiriagari (1958-).

Fujio Productions

Fujio Productions, established in 1965 with a focus on the cartoons of Fujio Akatsuka, publishes and merchandises Japanese manga productions based on widely loved characters such as Bakabon’s Papa, Unagi-Inu and Nyarome. Akatsuka’s works include “Tensai Bakabon,” “Osomatsu-kun,” “Himitsu no Akko-chan” and“Moretsu Ataro.”

©Disney
items.name: Mickey Manga Art UT (Short Sleeve Graphic T-Shirt)
items.shortDescription: A miraculous collaboration between the world-beloved Mickey Mouse and some of Japan’s best manga artists, Osamu Tezuka, Fujio Akatsuka, and Kotobuki Shiriagari.

items.longDescription:
STAR WARS FOREVER

Over 40 years later, “The Skywalker Saga” is finally coming to an end with Star Wars: The Rise of Skywalker. UNIQLO proudly presents the special collection to celebrate the release of this memorable film. All of the arts drawn by acclaimed artists from Japan, US and UK express the world of Star Wars in their own ways.

Stash

Stash was born in Long Island, New York. He is considered one of New York's graffiti legends, pivotal to the East Village scene of the early 1980's. While his contemporaries turned to Pop Art, Stash stayed true to the subway, working on trains until 1987.

© & ™ Lucasfilm Ltd.
items.name: STAR WARS Forever UT (Short Sleeve Graphic T-Shirt)
items.shortDescription: Introducing UT designed by three different artists, to commemorate the release of Star Wars: The Rise of Skywalker!

items.longDescription:
Sci-Fi Movie Collection

Science-fiction movies continue to draw attention and stir imagination of viewers through their futuristic views of the world and use of the latest technologies. This collection features some iconic sci-fi movies and we have picked famous scenes and quotes from those and incorporated them into our designs.

ALIEN

The time is the future. The crew aboard a massive commercial space vehicle is enroute to earth with a load of extraterrestrial ore when they are sidetracked by mysterious signals from a nearby planet. The signals seem to be calls for help and when the space ship arrives they find a ruined, moldering spacecraft and within it egg-like living organisms.

ALIEN TM & © 20th Century Fox
items.name: Sci-fi Movie UT (Short Sleeve Graphic T-Shirt)
items.shortDescription: This collection features famous scenes from some of the greatest sci-fi movies.

items.longDescription:
TOKYO UT

A collaboration between UT and four Japanese artists active in Japan and overseas, centered on the keyword “TOKYO.” This collection expresses the individual sensibilities of artists Meguru Yamaguchi, Kosuke Kawamura, FACE Oka, and YOSHIROTTEN.

YOSHIROTTEN

YOSHIROTTEN is a graphic artist and art director, based in Tokyo. He works across a wide spectrum of fields, including graphics, moving images, 3D works, installations and music. In 2018, after holding solo shows in London and Berlin, he mounted a massive exhibition of his works, titled “FUTURE NATURE” in Tokyo.

©YOSHIROTTEN
items.name: Tokyo UT (Short Sleeve Graphic T-Shirt)
items.shortDescription: New “TOKYO” tees featuring designs from four up-and-coming Japanese artists

items.longDescription:
TOKYO UT

A collaboration between UT and four Japanese artists active in Japan and overseas, centered on the keyword “TOKYO.” This collection expresses the individual sensibilities of artists Meguru Yamaguchi, Kosuke Kawamura, FACE Oka, and YOSHIROTTEN.

YOSHIROTTEN

YOSHIROTTEN is a graphic artist and art director, based in Tokyo. He works across a wide spectrum of fields, including graphics, moving images, 3D works, installations and music. In 2018, after holding solo shows in London and Berlin, he mounted a massive exhibition of his works, titled “FUTURE NATURE” in Tokyo.

©YOSHIROTTEN
items.name: Tokyo UT (Short Sleeve Graphic T-Shirt)
items.shortDescription: New “TOKYO” tees featuring designs from four up-and-coming Japanese artists

items.longDescription:
TOKYO UT

A collaboration between UT and four Japanese artists active in Japan and overseas, centered on the keyword “TOKYO.” This collection expresses the individual sensibilities of artists Meguru Yamaguchi, Kosuke Kawamura, FACE Oka, and YOSHIROTTEN.

Kosuke Kawamura

Graphic designer, art director, collage artist. In addition to providing artwork and graphics for apparel brands and advertisements, Kawamura is active in a wide range of activities such as creating fliers for music events, DVD / CD sleeves and book binding.

© Kosuke Kawamura
items.name: Tokyo UT (Short Sleeve Graphic T-Shirt)
items.shortDescription: New “TOKYO” tees featuring designs from four up-and-coming Japanese artists

items.longDescription:
TOKYO UT

A collaboration between UT and four Japanese artists active in Japan and overseas, centered on the keyword “TOKYO.” This collection expresses the individual sensibilities of artists Meguru Yamaguchi, Kosuke Kawamura, FACE Oka, and YOSHIROTTEN.

Meguru Yamaguchi

Born in Tokyo in 1984. Moved to the United States in 2007, and currently lives in Brooklyn. His brush strokes exist universally, traversing borders and eras. He uses this method in his creative work to sublimate the expressions of the times. His most well-known work is a piece called “OUT OF BOUNDS” that breaks out of the boundaries of the canvas, and exists solely as brush strokes. This is further deconstructed and rebuilt in his “SPLITTING HORIZON” series.

© Meguru Yamaguchi
items.name: Tokyo UT (Short Sleeve Graphic T-Shirt)
items.shortDescription: New “TOKYO” tees featuring designs from four up-and-coming Japanese artists

items.longDescription:
- Made with tightly woven 100% cotton material in an oversized silhouette.
- Textured jersey material with a diagonal weave on the surface.
- The color is inspired by workwear and military garments that look great using pre-washed fabric.
- A collar in the same fabric as the body, tape behind the placket, a pocket on the left chest area, and an adjusted stitch count using thicker thread, for a more casual feel.

items.shortDescription: A loose and casual piece, with an on-trend oversized silhouette that looks great.

Nintendo Switch’s “Animal Crossing: New Horizons” lets you enjoy a free and easy life on a deserted island where time flows just like in real life. It can be used as a daily bath towel, or as a poncho using the attached buttons. A towel that is also convenient for use at pools and beaches.

© 2020 Nintendo

items.longDescription:
FUTURALABORATORIES

FUTURALABORATORIES is a design company and lifestyle brand created by the artist FUTURA2000 in 1997, as a spinoff group to the parent company at that time; PROJECTDRAGON. FUTURALABORATORIES has always worked closely with UMBRELLA FILMS for visual amplification and TARANTULA DESIGNS as a graphic think tank. The brand has created many collections over multiple decades and found numerous partners in various collaborative efforts. FUTURALABORATORIES was rebooted in 2019 with excitement and engagement across multiple platforms.

Groundbreaking DRY-EX material quickly dries sweat and moisture.

Futura Laboratories LLC.
items.name: MEN FUTURA LABORATORIES DRY-EX Half-Zip Short Sleeve T-Shirt
items.shortDescription: Groundbreaking DRY-EX material quickly dries sweat and moisture.

items.longDescription:
MARVEL Essentials

The Super Heroes of the Marvel Universe are relatable and inspirational. Marvel has been creating numerous super heroes and their stories for over 80 years. Many of Marvel’s star characters were created during the Marvel Age of American Comics and have become pop culture icons beloved around the world by people ages and old.

©2021 MARVEL
items.name: MEN MARVEL Essentials UT (Short Sleeve Graphic T-Shirt)
items.shortDescription: Cool expression of the iconic motifs of Marvel heroes!

items.longDescription:
Mickey Motifs

Mickey Mouse has long been known for his iconic red shorts with two buttons, large yellow shoes, and white gloves. Then one day Mickey Mouse fell asleep and had a dream where his clothing came to life and began to move freely! This collection is inspired by a magical dream.

©Disney
items.name: Mickey Motifs UT(Short Sleeve Graphic T-Shirt)
items.shortDescription: In Mickey Mouse’s dream, his shoes and gloves start moving about freely! Introducing a fantasy-filled UT collection.

items.longDescription:
Jason Polan

Jason was an exceptionally talented artist and a genuinely kind person. He had the rare gift of making the most everyday things beautiful and interesting. It was an extension of the way he lived his life. This collection honors some of Jason’s favorite iconic drawings as well as shares new art from his Every Person In New York book. Please share in Jason’s incredible legacy with the Jason Polan UT Collection.

Jason Polan, originally from Michigan, lived in New York following college. His work is exhibited all over the world. He was the founding member of Taco Bell Drawing Club. Polan did projects with The New York Times, The Ford Foundation, The New Yorker and more. Polan continued to draw every person in New York until his death from cancer at age 37.

©Jason Polan
items.name: Jason Polan UT (Short Sleeve Graphic T-Shirt)
items.shortDescription: Jason Polan continuously drew cities and people. Many of his love filled works are now available from UT.

Please share in Jason’s incredible legacy with the Jason Polan UT Collection.

items.shortDescription: Special collaboration with Jurassic World

items.longDescription:
Jurassic World × HAJIME SORAYAMA

Explore the wonder and thrills of Jurassic World in an all new collaboration with Sorayama.
The collection includes Sorayama’s new work which is inspired by the Jurassic World franchise alongside Sorayama’s archival artworks.

Hajime Sorayama

Born in 1947 in Ehime prefecture, Japan. Armed with his astounding sense of realistic expressional techniques, Sorayama had developed his career since the early 1970s as an illustrator of pinups. His signature body of work titled, the “Sexy Robot” series (1978-) that integrates the aesthetic beauty of the female body into the context of the robot had come to present a significant influence on the subsequent formulation of robotic imagery. He also earned renown for his design work on the original Sony AIBO and for the album cover that he created for American rock band Aerosmith.

© Universal City Studios LLC and Amblin Entertainment, Inc. All Rights Reserved.
© Hajime Sorayama Courtesy of Nanzuka
items.name: MEN Jw X Sorayama UT(Short Sleeve Graphic T-Shirt)
items.shortDescription: A special collaboration between the "Jurassic World" and acclaimed Japanese artist Hajime Sorayama.

items.longDescription:

items.longDescription:
Musèe du Louvre: Art and Logic by PETER SAVILLE

Peter Saville is a legendary designer and art director for music and fashion. “I was inspired to discover thet the world's most famous work of art, the ‘Mona Lisa,’ is known at the Louvre simply as Painting No.779 － this is my theme for the Art and Logic collection.”

Flowers, Grapes, and Peaches / Jan Frans van DAEL
© RMN-Grand Palais (Musée du Louvre) / Adrien Didierjean
© PETER SAVILLE
items.name: Louvre Museum UT (Short Sleeve Graphic T-Shirt)
items.shortDescription: A brilliant collaboration between the renowned graphic designer Peter Saville and the Louvre Museum.

items.longDescription:
Musèe du Louvre: Art and Logic by PETER SAVILLE

Peter Saville is a legendary designer and art director for music and fashion. “I was inspired to discover thet the world's most famous work of art, the ‘Mona Lisa,’ is known at the Louvre simply as Painting No.779 － this is my theme for the Art and Logic collection.”

Aphrodite, known as the "Venus de Milo" / Hellenistic Art (C. 100 BC), Island of Melos (Cyclades, Greece)
© Musée du Louvre, Dist. RMN-Grand Palais / Anne Chauvet
© PETER SAVILLE
items.name: Louvre Museum UT (Short Sleeve Graphic T-Shirt)
items.shortDescription: A brilliant collaboration between the renowned graphic designer Peter Saville and the Louvre Museum.

items.longDescription:
Hokusai Colors

Hokusai’s designs for woodblock prints create spectacular visual effects with just a few well-chosen colors. Color variations in different editions of the same design may have been chosen by Hokusai himself; or by the printer who applied the color to the blocks for printing; or by the publisher who supervised the whole process and sold the finished prints. Printmaking was truly a collaborative art.
items.name: HOKUSAI Colours UT (Short Sleeve Graphic T-Shirt)
items.shortDescription: Check out the delicate yet bold use of color and composition in the masterworks of Katsushika Hokusai, an ukiyo-e artist of the Edo period.

items.longDescription:
- Made with 2-way fabric that stretches vertically and horizontally.
- The elastic in the waist is completely covered with the same fabric as the pants for a neat, simple look.
- Made of smooth cotton twill, so you can dress them up.
- A slender, slim-fit tapered cut in a perfect ankle length.
items.name: MEN Smart Ankle Pants 2Way Stretch (Cotton)
items.shortDescription: Natural cotton that is easy to coordinate. They look sharp, but have stress-free comfort.

items.freeInformation:
Manufactured by
ORIENT FASHION EXPORTS INDIA PVT LTD
Plot No. 488, Udyog Vihar Phase III, Gurgaon,Haryana, 122016
items.longDescription:
- Made from 100% ultra-long cotton fibers for a soft, glossy look and durable design.
- A casually refined style.
- This season’s updates include a straight silhouette to accentuate the draping fabric.
- In a well-balanced cut that is slim but still easy to move in
- This single-wash item has a brushed feel, and has undergone special processing for wrinkle-resistance.
- Adjusted the balance of the collar and used a firm neck for the base collar with a soft core fabric for the upper collar to create a perfect fit.
- The placket is made of soft interlining fabric, and the cuffs are made of firm interlining fabric.
- By reducing the number of stitches, this item has a more beautiful print pattern and the collar, placket, and pocket patterns also match. The color of the stitches and button holes have been carefully selected.
- The armholes and the underside have a beautiful finish and are folded down so that it does not touch your skin.
items.name: MEN Extra Fine Cotton Broadcloth Long Sleeve Shirt
items.shortDescription: Improved to provide a more on-trend straight silhouette. Got rid of the brushed feel for a smoother texture.

items.longDescription:
- 2-way stretch cotton twill stretches vertically and horizontally.
- This item provides stress-free comfort and is easy to wear even when you bend your knees.
- The tapered begins high at the knee positions make your legs look long and slim.
- Belt and waist darts ensure a secure fit.
- The bio-wash processing makes it softer and feels more soft to the touch.
items.name: MEN Skinny Fit Chino Pants 2Way Stretch
items.shortDescription: Excellent stretch for easy movement. The skinny silhouette will make your feet look sharp.

items.longDescription:
- 100% fine cotton made from ultra-long cotton fibers.
- Easy care and wrinkle resistant.
items.name: MEN Easy Care Checked Regular Fit Long Sleeve Shirt
items.shortDescription: 100% fine cotton makes it feel good and looks beautiful. Easy to iron for low maintenance.

items.longDescription:
- Groundbreaking DRY-EX material that dries sweat and moisture very quickly.
- Added anti-microbial and anti-odor functions to keep you feeling fresh, even after sweating.
- This season, we have adjusted the shoulders and chest area and made the sleeves longer, in order to make it better for sports and exercise.
- To go along with the adjustments made to the shoulders and chest area, we have also adjusted the rib width of the placket and cuffs, in units of one millimeter.
- Designed with a collar that looks great worn on its own or under a jacket.
items.name: MEN DRY-EX Pique Short Sleeve Polo Shirt
items.shortDescription: A polo shirt that has both great functionality and design. Looks stylish, while keeping you comfortable.

items.longDescription:
NIPPON MIYAGE

We have portrayed Japan’s famous sights and motifs with original graphics. We hope you enjoy these unique designs that are full of personality.

items.longDescription:
FUTURALABORATORIES

FUTURALABORATORIES is a design company and lifestyle brand created by the artist FUTURA2000 in 1997, as a spinoff group to the parent company at that time; PROJECTDRAGON. FUTURALABORATORIES has always worked closely with UMBRELLA FILMS for visual amplification and TARANTULA DESIGNS as a graphic think tank. The brand has created many collections over multiple decades and found numerous partners in various collaborative efforts. FUTURALABORATORIES was rebooted in 2019 with excitement and engagement across multiple platforms.

Balances both high functionality and design. A versatile shirt for sporty and casual styles.
- Featuring DRY-EX technology.
- Comes with odor control features.

Futura Laboratories LLC.
